data.title: Software Engineer, ZkSystems GmbH (Startup, seed phase)
data.description: Responsible for planning and developing the app (cross-platform) and automation core for the ZeroWork.io launch

tasks.description: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in agile product development on strategic and operative level
Evaluation, validation and implementation of product feature roadmap for app and automation core including logging and analytics (user journey)
Integration of Stripe payments system in backend, app and marketplace utilizing REST API and Webhooks
Integration of queue management system for workflow execution in backend and app utilizing AWS SQS, Redis and Bull QM
Built automation core (greenfield project) in Python to drive No-Code building logic of app
Migration of Python code base to TypeScript to account for future requirements on performance, scalability and maintainability

data.title: Web Developer, auteon GmbH (Startup, PoC phase)
data.description: Responsible for planning and developing auteons article comparison mechanism via browser automation and supplier APIs

tasks.description: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in agile product development on strategic and operative level for backend
Testing, maintaining and optimizing existing software components to increase robustness, correctness and speed for core product
Coordination, support and code review for 3 working students within the automation team
Migration of monolithic legacy code to modular automation core with Clean Code approach

data.title: Technical Account Manager, Hilti AG
data.description: Responsible for 700+ industrial clients (SME) regarding consulting and direct sales in defined territory in Berlin area

tasks.description: Build, care and develop customer relations in accordance to company targets and cost efficient resourcing
Product presentation, delivering technical workshops and consulting customers with company's systematic sales approach
Qualitative and quantitive market research in cooperation with leadership team and technical task force to address market opportunity

Admission to Hilti's Top Club Germany by the general management for exceeding strategic company targets for 2 consecutive years based on customer loyalty, revenue growth and execution of companys long-term growth initiatives

data.summary: Full stack software developer with an engineering background who relies on a passion for learning, acute attention to detail and effective communication to deliver exceptional results. My mission is to help purposeful tech companies realize their vision of the future by working pragmatically, thoroughly and business-oriented.
